Title: 39634 - # Reasons to Consider Online Invoicing
Direction: 675 words. List 4-8 reasons that small to mid-size business owners and startups would want to consider using online invoicing. You should talk about the ease, convenience, and accuracy of sending invoices to clients online. You can also talk about how online invoicing can help you get your customers to pay on time. Make sure to highlight all the benefits that online invoicing offers. Link to your target URL in any section by suggesting Sage One as software that allows for online invoicing. Your target audience is business owners.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: Create online invoices with Sage One
